description: Non-REM RDI at 4% desat  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas in non-REM sleep associated with >= 4% desat) / (hours of NREM sleep)]
calculation: rdinr4p  = 60*(hnrbp4 + hnrop4 + canbp4 + canop4 + oanbp4 + oanop4) / (slpprdp - minremp)

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall Non-rem RDI at 4% desat
